title: Aurelion Sol Skin Idea
body: I just really think League needs to give Aurelion Sol a Dark Star skin!

replies.body:
His Stun could turn into spinning Black Holes
and his Ult would be a vortex pillar
and when he flies he could have an effect like he was going through a bard portal but with black and purple stripes of energy

Star Guardian anyone?

No? Okay.

Dark Star it is. Go!
Well Sol is actually a destroyer of stars so a dark star skin would make more sense
Dude, everybody think Rito needs to give Aurelion a Dark Star skin, i can't remember how many concept of that i saw before, that will happens ! :D
Yeah, after all, he's the Star Forger!

I know right!
Plus i think it would be a fitting theme skin for him as an addition to the Dark Stars :D
